full_text:
RT @AnnCoulter: “It’s OK. Because in about 40 years, half the country will be black or brown. And there is nothing you can do about it.
“No…

retweeted_status.full_text:
“It’s OK. Because in about 40 years, half the country will be black or brown. And there is nothing you can do about it.
“Nothing, Senor Tancredo.”

-- Great Replacement advocate, Tim Wise

"いや...

"何もありません タンクレードさん"
